        public JsonValue getRootValue()
        Returns the JsonValue at the root of this document.

      • setRootValue

      • getValueByPointer

        public JsonValue getValueByPointer(JsonPointer pointer)
        Looks up a JsonValue which is referenced by a given JSON pointer.
        Parameters:
        pointer - the JSON pointer which refers to a JsonValue.
        Returns:
        the JsonValue if found, null otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if specified pointer is null.
